name: EPICNewsreCAP
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: A recap of what happened this past week at the Oklahoma Capitol. What are the biggest bills that will impact your life and what is the legislature up to? Plus, each week will feature a different lawmaker talking about their time in office and their priorities for the session.
